nice work, you haven't linked which movie this is, or even confirmed it once someone provided the link, you don't mention what LANGUAGE this is in, or the fact that there are no subs available anywhere for it. is it so hard to leave an imdb link? or INDICATE WHAT LANGUAGE the film is in?.
